CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How fast the time variable grows, whether it is reactive time or constant time.
CONTROLS.NAME: fly_speed

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Change the colors palette slightly. Color cycle is audioreactive
CONTROLS.NAME: Color_Cycle

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Remove the colored background to black. Good to use with an Auto Mask
CONTROLS.NAME: DeColorize

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add some cool audioreactive distortion to the scene
CONTROLS.NAME: Distort

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How high the bioorganic pieces will extrude towards the screen
CONTROLS.NAME: Bio_Height

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How much the bass levels affect the bulging of the bump map
CONTROLS.NAME: Bass_Bulge

DESCRIPTION: Raymarching a textured XY plane. Basically, just an excuse to try out the new pebbled texture.
TITLE: Bioorganic Wall
